title: Lessons From the 2016 NBA Draft | The Corner 3 (Ep. 350)
description:
We review some of the Houston Rockets’ biggest problems and ask whether they could be remedied with a Kevin Love trade (1:30). Then we take a look back at the lessons we learned from the 2016 draft (25:00), before throwing an outlet pass to this weekend’s games (37:18).
Hosts: Kevin O’Connor, Jonathan Tjarks, Danny Chau

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
